settings.title: Get Professional-Grade Diabetic Neuropathy Pain Relief
settings.text:
• Soothes diabetic neuropathy discomfort in the hands & feet
  • Powerful 11% menthol formula clinically proven to provide deep pain relief
  • Long-lasting and fast-acting FDA-approved solution
settings.btn-btm: Shipping on us* • 30 Day Money Back Guarantee

settings.heading: Tired of Numb, tingling Feet & Legs?

settings.caption: Diabetic Neuropathy is an invisible pain nobody seems to understand. But Viasox does. That’s why we’re dedicated to fighting your:

settings.text:
Burning, “Stabbing” nerve zaps

Throbbing, swollen leg and foot pain

Pesky tingling and numb sensations

Discomfort from sock ring imprints

Foot ulcers, infections and nerve
sensitivity issues

settings.title: Tired of Numb, tingling Feet & Legs?
30 Days Money Back
settings.text: Not 100% satisfied? We got you covered.

settings.heading: Meet the STRONGEST Formula For Diabetic Neuropathy

settings.caption: Here’s why people with diabetes are obsessed with our Non-Binding Socks:

settings.text:
Triple padded support for all-day foot protection from diabetic neuropathy

The stretchiest socks on the market making them easy to put on and take off

Non-binding to eliminate irritating and painful sock marks

Anti-microbial bamboo material prevents infections, reduces odors and keep feet dry

Seamless toe design prevents foot ulcers, rubbing, infections and more

settings.title: Meet the STRONGEST Formula For Diabetic Neuropathy

settings.heading: How Can Non-Binding Diabetic Socks Help With Ny Neuropathy?

settings.caption: Nerve damage from neuropathy causes your feet to be extremely sensitive. Our non-binding diabetic socks have triple padded bamboo  soles to reduce the burning and stabbing sensations from peripheral neuropathy allowing you to get the comfort you deserve.

settings.title: How Can Non-Binding Diabetic Socks Help With Ny Neuropathy?

settings.heading: Don’t Know If These Are For You?

settings.text: We’re happy to help you find the perfect solution. Try our 3 minute quiz to help you decide if these socks are right for you!

settings.caption: When you order from Viasox, we donate $1 to a diabetic charity. With over $140,000 donated so far, together we are making an impact!

settings.name: Sharon M.
settings.title: Best socks ever!
settings.text: I am not diabetic, but I do have very thick ankles and calves. To be honest, it's been many years since I've been able to wear socks that come up my calves, and these don't disappoint. They don't dig in or compress my legs at all, they don't bind at the ankle and the seamless foot is nicely padded on the bottom.

settings.name: Leslie O.
settings.title: They fit
settings.text: I bought these for my dad and he says they are really comfy and they do not leave any marks like other socks tried. Highly recommend.

settings.name: Lily T.
settings.title: Looks great!
settings.text: 12/8/2020- Today is the first time I am wearing my new FDS- they feel very comfy, my calves do not have sock indentations like my other socks would cause. Pleased

settings.name: Jody P.
settings.title: Foot Butter :-)
settings.text: These are THE MOST COMFORTABLE socks i have EVER worn. The bottom is so soft it felt like clouds initially. What a refreshing change!! I ordered large which ran big so i changed to medium for next delivery. I need a little more compression so hopefully it'll do it. If not Ill still wear them proudly. Soooooo NICE !!!

settings.name: Raiondra T.
settings.title: Great design
settings.text: I love the separate design from the heal of the feet from the leg, it gives great definitions and helps keep the sock from sliding while in a shoe or rotating around your foot while in a slide in or loose fitting shoe on those extra swollen days.plus with the leg tubing designed different the fabric gives different but enough hold to compress the leg during fluid build up etc

settings.name: Madalinn V.
settings.title: Soft and Non binding Comfort!!
settings.text: These are the most comfortable socks I have ever worn. I'm a diabetic and have had a hard time finding socks that don’t squeeze my legs for years. They stay up or you can slouch them down. These are perfect. I hope to get quite a few more pairs. Wish they came in solid black but for this type of comfort I’ll be patient.....Thanks Guys!!!

settings.name: Patricia H.
settings.title: Feels sooooo good!!!!!
settings.text: These sox are wonderful ! They feel great all over, toes, heels, ankles, and legs! They’re beautifully colored and just wearing them makes me feel good and you will too !❤️

settings.heading: What Is Viasox?
settings.text: Viasox is a North American brand dedicated to helping people with diabetes, providing customers with the highest quality products for individuals living with diabetes

settings.heading: When Will I Receive My Package?
settings.text: All orders take 1-3 business days to process after your order is placed. Thereafter, packages will take 4-8 business days to reach you. Your confirmation email received upon ordering will enclose your package’s ETA. Please note, the ETA is an estimate and does not account for weekends or holidays. There are no shipment notification emails sent.

settings.heading: What Payment Types Do We Accept?
settings.text: We currently accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Debit Visas and PayPal.To set up with PayPal – please Email us at support@viasox.com

settings.heading: Does Viasox Do Returns?
settings.text: All Viasox sales are final and non-refundable. We're sorry we're unable to accept returns due to the nature of our product. When you send back the item to us, we're unable to send them to other customers.

settings.heading: What If I Received The Wrong Size/Pattern Than What I Ordered?
settings.text: If you have received something other than what you were expecting, please email us at support@viasox.com within five days of receiving your socks. You will be asked to provide us with a photo of the item that you received for verification. If you do contact us after the five-day period, we may not be able to assist you with any concerns regarding your items.

settings.heading: What If I Received Something Damaged?
settings.text: If you have received something other than what you were expecting, please email us at support@viasox.com within five days of receiving your order. Please make sure it's in the same condition as received and in its original packaging. As your order may not be eligible for a replacement if it has been washed, has visible wear or damage, and is not in the original packaging, including outer sleeves and tags. If you do contact us after the five-day period, we may not be able to assist you with any concerns regarding your items.
